snippet.title: Tetra Tactics - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Strategize, collect, upgrade. Tetra Tactics (formerly known as Card Craft) is a roguelike deckbuilder inspired by Triple Triad/Tetra Master with deep meta-progression and replayability. Outwit your opponents on a tactical grid, traverse the map, augment your cards, and combine abilities to ultimately build the most powerful deck. 

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1937110/

Developed by indie team Hero's Journey in Oakland, CA. 

Leaving early access and fully launching on April 9, 2024!
